title: Social Media Ninja & Graphic Art Guru with SEO Expertise
job_overview:
Location: Remote
Job Type: Full-Time
Compensation: $4/hour

Exciting. Dynamic. Urgent. We are searching for an Experienced Social Media Ninja & Graphic Art Guru to join our team at Instinctive Branding! You will be working independently while utilizing SocialPilot to monitor and manage your hours worked. If you're ready to take your social media and design skills to the next level and make a significant impact, this is the opportunity for you!

About Us:
Welcome to Instinctive Branding—where creativity meets strategy! We are on a mission to transform brands into unforgettable experiences. If you're a passionate and innovative professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment and knows how to create compelling content that captures attention, we want you to join our team!

Why Instinctive Branding?
Work Independently: Embrace the freedom of remote work while being a vital part of a collaborative team.
Dynamic Culture: Be surrounded by forward-thinking professionals who are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of branding and marketing.
Transparent Tracking System: We utilize a tracking system to monitor hours worked, allowing you to focus on creativity without worrying about micromanagement.
Compensation Policy: We compensate teaUpgrade to see actual infombers for the actual hours worked, up to a maximum of 40 hours per week. It is expected that all scheduled hours are actively worked and productive to ensure accountability and alignment with our goals. This ensures that our teaUpgrade to see actual infombers are as protected as we are. 

Your Responsibilities:
Strategic Management: Oversee and grow our social media channels, developing engaging content that aligns with our brand vision and resonates with our audience.
Content Creation: Craft eye-catching brand specific graphics, videos, blogs and other written content that drives engagement and shares our clients brand stories.
Graphic Design: Design visually appealing materials for both digital spaces, including social media posts, brochures, and promotional graphics.
SEO Expertise: Utilize your knowledge of SEO, including backlinks and keywords, to optimize content for search engines and improve visibility.
Analytics & Optimization: Analyze performance metrics to refine strategies, ensuring every campaign is more successful than the last.
Trend Engagement: Stay ahead of the curve by jumping on trends and creating timely content that reflects the brand’s voice and mission.
Community Engagement: Develop and nurture a vibrant online community by responding to comments, initiating discussions, and sparking conversations.
Effective Communication: Collaborate seamlessly using tools like Slack, WhatsApp, and Zoom to stay connected with the team. Be able to create content in English, without errors. 

What We’re Looking For:
Viral Creator: Proven track record of launching viral campaigns or growing social media accounts with demonstrable results. Show us your success!
Digital Native: Deep understanding of platforms like Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, Facebook, and YouTube. You know what works on each platform and understands the usage of hashtags. 
Graphic Design Pro: Strong skills in graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, CapCut, Canva, etc.) to create stunning visuals that enhance our clients brand.
SEO Savvy: Expertise in SEO practices, including knowledge of backlinks and keywords, to enhance content reach and effectiveness.
Tech-Savvy Communicator: Proficiency in communication tools such as Slack, WhatsApp, and Zoom for effective collaboration with our team.
Creative Innovator: A unique perspective that allows you to think outside the box and create content that captivates and engages.
Analytical Mind: An ability to interpret data and use insights to inform your decision-making and strategy refinement.
Community Builder: You know how to foster genuine connections and make followers feel part of something special.

Join Instinctive Branding and help us create memorable brand experiences that resonate! 

What to include in your Application
Years of experience
Why you’re passionate about social media
3 examples of your own social media content including 1 video, one static post
1 blog you’ve written 
Level of understanding from 1 - 5, of Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and TikTok.  

Apply now—we can’t wait to see the magic you’ll bring to our team! ?????
